      • getAuction

        public Auction getAuction(int auctionId)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get an auction from database by auction's id.
        Parameters:
        auctionId - The id of an auction that is wanted to be searched.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • updateAuction

        public int updateAuction(Auction auction,
                         int auctionId)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Update an auction information into the database.
        Parameters:
        auction - The auction that is wanted to be update into the database.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if update successfully, if not it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.
